meanings.sent1: The lambier dog could walk better than the lame one.
meanings.sent2: She felt a bit lambier after resting for a while.
meanings.sent3: The lambier cat tried to chase the mouse but stumbled comically.
meanings.sent4: His excuse was lambier than hers, but both were unconvincing.
meanings.sent5: The lambier path through the forest was easier to walk on than the rocky one.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the injured animals, the lambier horse struggled the most.
meanings.sent2: The lambier of the two siblings needed a crutch to walk.
meanings.sent3: The lambier cake at the party was devoured first, despite its appearance.
meanings.sent4: Her excuse was the lambier of them all, making everyone suspicious.
meanings.sent5: The lambier route up the mountain was treacherous but offered the best view at the top.
